content: https://ibb.co/gyc7zcWDeusFinance DAO : World-first decentralized bilateral OTC derivatives platform._______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________https://i.imgur.com/kw0dNZL.png  https://i.imgur.com/3tjawcx.png  https://i.imgur.com/VLuTL9G.png   https://i.imgur.com/8YVVSCd.png   https://i.imgur.com/epkPFTa.png   https://i.imgur.com/7Qld6sd.png   https://i.imgur.com/3tjawcx.png     https://i.imgur.com/3tjawcx.pngWEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TWITTER  | MEDIUM  | YOUTUBE  | TELEGRAM  | CONTRACT  | AUDIT  |_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________About Deus Finance DAO:DEUS is building a peer-to-peer derivatives platform called DeFiX (decentralized financial information exchange protocol). DeFiX is an OTC derivatives clearinghouse that leverages smart contract blockchains and Muon to enable traders, third-party exchanges, and market makers to interact with each other directly without any intermediaries. To learn more about DeFiX, view the DEUS whitepaper here.DeFiX is designed to be a sustainable and capital-efficient derivatives clearinghouse without sacrificing trading restrictions such as high collateral requirements, low leverage, and a limited tradable universe. This is achievable due to our revolutionary counterparty risk management strategy.★★★★★GENERAL BOUNTY DETAILS★★★★★1. Bounty Campaign is managed by PanduGeddonrozak2. Must follow telegram channel - https://t.me/PanduGeddonrozak_ch3. Must join telegram bounty - https://t.me/+p2Ne3GqqBM9iNjM14. $20,000 worth of BUSD will be divided to all participants depending on stakes accumulated3. Bounty Campaign will run for 4 weeks - 17/05/2022 - 13/06/20224. Bounty rewards will be distributed 1 weeks after the bounty ends.5. Bounty rewards will be sent to your BEP-20 Wallet address6. Wallet address cannot be change once submitted7. Members with negative trust will be accepted.★★★★★BOUNTY SCHEDULE★★★★★Week 1: 17/05/2022 - 23/05/2022. ENDWeek 2: 24/05/2022 - 30/05/2022Week 3: 31/05/2022 - 06/06/2022Week 4: 07/06/2022 - 13/06/2022★★★★★BOUNTY ALLOCATION★★★★★Twitter: 60%Telegram: 40%Proof Of Registration FormatQuote#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BEP20  Wallet Address:★★★★★TWITTER CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Must follow Deus Finance DAO twitter profile: https://twitter.com/DeusDao2. Twitter Account must have atleast 300 followers3. Participants must RT + Quote (Max of 1 per day) 5 tweets made by DeusDao4. Participants must tweet 2 original tweet (Max of 1 per day)5. HASTAG : #DeusFinance #Deusdao #Deus #Bsc #cryptoqurrency #Blockchain ★★★★★TWITTER CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★300 to 1999 Followers = 1 Stake2000 to 5000 Followers = 2 Stakes5001 and Up Followers = 3 StakesForm: https://forms.gle/oezE9fcxxMAaqkP18★★★★★TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN RULES★★★★★1. Must follow DeusDao Telegram group: https://t.me/deusfinance2. Must create an informative post about all group about Deus Dao3. Must include Telegram group link on your post.4. Max of 5 post per week5. HASTAG : #DeusFinance #Deusdao #Deus #Bsc #cryptoqurrency #Blockchain ★★★★★TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN REWARDS★★★★★10 Stake per valid postForm: https://forms.gle/htbQSg1j2Jgn5xZu9★★★★★CAMPAIGN REPORTING GUIDE★★★★★Bitcointalk UsernameBitcointalk Profile LinkProof of Authentication Link:Week # Twitter CampaignRT + Quote #1: RT + Quote #2: RT + Quote #3: RT + Quote #4: RT + Quote #5: Own Tweet #1Own Tweet #2Telegram CampaignPost Link #1Post Link #2Post Link #3Post Link #5Post Link #5SPREADSHEETS update soon
